plot: The rich patriarch of his family fakes his own death bed to see who is worthy to inherit his wealth in this modern day silent film.
title: Heirs
plot_es: The rich patriarch of his family fakes his own death bed to see who is worthy to inherit his wealth in this modern day silent film.
plot_en: The rich patriarch of his family fakes his own death bed to see who is worthy to inherit his wealth in this modern day silent film.
